WorkItem.Description: For version 3.0 tools update release, on Page 82, after folks copy some Account files from the Assets zip, PDF says "Change the namespace for Controller and Model classes to begin with MvcMusicStore." You should mention people also need to change the namespace for all the Account Views files that refer to a model in the @model statement (see screencapture).
WorkItem.Summary: p82 - Changing the namespace for Account files copied in from Assets zip
